text.text_translated: For ten years, people criticised big shops. They did wrong things. They wasted much food. They paid suppliers too little. They used too much plastic for packaging. This plastic was bad for our world. But now, these shops are listening and paying attention. People were very angry about plastic waste. They complained to the shops. So, big UK supermarkets made a promise. They will make packaging better. They will cut plastic waste.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Packaging is the material around products. For example, plastic or paper.

For the last ten years, people criticised supermarkets and grocers. They did bad things. They wasted many tonnes of food. They paid their suppliers too little money. They put too much plastic for packaging. This plastic hurt our world. But now, these shops are listening. People were very angry about the plastic waste. They showed their anger to the shops. So, big UK supermarkets made a promise. They will make packaging better. They will cut plastic waste.
